body: @theshadedraven I never personally messaged them so not sure, you could try contacting them on twitter. You can see all of their works on https://2dgen.com/circle/75160 which shows past and present works. Most of the older ones aren't available when you click the links now
@pornbob69 did you find if the artist still has access to them? Im willing to drop some on them.. i love their work
i hope that this bitch gets translated
Damn bro she sucked and fucked him to another dimension.

@Nopex123 Sorry dude, by "horny people with no lives and too much time on their hands" I was refering to the ones that create that "If you're reading this" bs. I got no problem with anyone else here, hence why I'm here in the first place.

The artists twitter handle https://twitter.com/sent1991bank

Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/13327897

Older pixiv(?): https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/33444709

Their old pixiv has some pics of other doujin but I don't know where I can find them. Also some old pics on the twitter from deleted pixiv posts so I'm not sure what's going on. But it's good to see how their art has progressed over two years, most artists don't improve and remain stagnant.
@rufusjunior why roast all of us just roast that guy alone 🤣

@plazyduck77 "Not gonna risk", fuck right off with that. Ah yes, demons and witches come on this site specifically to hex other people. You know damn well it's just horny people with no lives and too much time on their hands.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk
